alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 7:50PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Itawamba and southeastern Tishomingo Counties through 815 PM CST... At 750 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mantachie, or near Fulton, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fulton, Belmont, Mantachie, Fairview, Sandy Springs, Clay, Golden, Eastman, Dennis, Moores Mill and Bounds Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for northeastern Mississippi.
